citations.narrative:
The annual report for the previous Federal fiscal year, signed by the Institutional Official, has not been submitted to
the AC Regional Director prior to December 1, 2017. Submission of the annual report in a timely manner is
necessary to assure compliance with the standards for the care and use of live animals by a research facility. The
annual report for the previous Federal fiscal year, signed by the Institutional Official, must be submitted to the
Western Regional Animal Care Office in Fort Collins, Colorado. To be corrected: Immediately.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.

narrative:
2.36(a)                    REPEAT
ANNUAL REPORT.
The annual report for the previous Federal fiscal year, signed by the Institutional Official, has not been submitted to
the AC Regional Director prior to December 1, 2017.  Submission of the annual report in a timely manner is
necessary to assure compliance with the standards for the care and use of live animals by a research facility.  The
annual report for the previous Federal fiscal year, signed by the Institutional Official, must be submitted to the
Western Regional Animal Care Office in Fort Collins, Colorado.  To be corrected:  Immediately.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
